summary.Title: Join Wokshop - kitchen help
summary.Presentation:
Join Wokshop
We are looking for skilled kitchen help who has experience with Asia and /or Indian food and are use to work in a high pace kitchen environment. 
Wokshop

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Join Wokshop

We are looking for skilled kitchen help who has experience with Asia and /or Indian food and are use to work in a high pace kitchen environment. 

Wokshop has been making authentic thai food for 20 years both for our restaurants and in our up scale take away concept. 

We have 10 restaurants placed in Copenhagen, North Sealand and Odense. 

We are currently looking for 4 kitchen helpers. It is a requirement that you have a valid work permit that allows you to work in the EU / Denmark. 

 

*** Thai people currently residing in European Union or EEA are also welcome to apply
*** Only shortlisted candidate will be notified

 Requirements:
- Wide experience in Thai and or India cuisine 
- Profound knowledge of food ingredients used in Thai cooking is a big plus 
- Proficient in Thai and or India cuisine food preparations
- Able to work in a fast-paced environment
- Team player
- Able to work on weekends and public holidays

Please send your application written in English or Thai to job@wokshop.dk and mark it ‘kitchen help'

Do not hesitate to send your application as we have open positions right now.  

We look forward to receive your applictaion.
